Name: FREEZEFRAME
About the game: TRAPPED IN A MUSEUM WITH JUST YOUR CAMERA... A museum closes its doors for the night and you are still inside. Not a great start. About FREEZEFRAME is a short 3D puzzle platformer based inside a museum that you find yourself stuck inside. Use your cameras unique feature of teleportation to complete puzzles, collect keys to unlock the museums front door and escape. Moving platforms, fans, an acid-filled gift shop and more await you in FREEZEFRAME. Gameplay Take a photo with your camera and at the click of a button, teleport to where you took the photo. Use this unique feature to try and escape the same fate as the exhibits.
